Crimes.Dispute_Type: Dispute over inclusion of non-custodial youth sentence in parole eligibility calculations post-amendments to CCRA
Crimes.Perpetrator_Type: Youth offender with subsequent adult sentence
Crimes.Governing_Law: Criminal Code of Canada, Youth Criminal Justice Act (YCJA), Corrections and Conditional Release Act (CCRA)
Crimes.Applicable_Statute: Section 743.5 of the Criminal Code, Section 139 of the CCRA

Crimes.Procedural_Issues: Interpretation of recent amendments to CCRA
Crimes.Legal_Procedure: Judicial review under Federal Courts Act
Crimes.Government_Body_Involved: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), Chief of Sentence Management (CSM)
